name: Candy Treat
description:
Candy Treat is a game where you walk back and forth from the candy machine and the door to give treaters candy within a time limit.

Controls.

  1. ESC to press start and pause the game.
  2. WASD keys to move the player.
  3. MOUSE pad to rotate camera.
  4. E key to open the door and give candy.
  5. SHIFT to sprint.
